features: Endura® shell construction features an injection-molded ABS exterior for long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength
Passive ventilation channels integrated into the helmet drawfresh air in the front and pull moisture out the back; Goggle ventilation channel provides additional airflow
Multidirectional Impact Protection System (MIPS) is a revolutionary technology that mimics the brain's own protection system with a low friction layer that lets the helmet slide relative to the head
Auto-adjust fit system features an elastic closure in the rear of the helmet that dynamically flexes around the wearer's head for a perfect fit
Fidlock® snap helmet buckle uses magnets to allowyou to open and close the buckle with one hand, even when wearing gloves
